home-page.p: I'm Rashi Chugani, A senior Web Developing student at I.E.S Puerto de la Cruz with an interest in Web development, UI/UX Design, Front-end developing and maybe Back-end developing

about-page.p1: Hello! My name is Rashi Chugani Narwani, and I am a passionate web developer currently studying at. I enjoy crafting user-friendly, visually appealing websites and applications, always striving to learn the latest technologies and best practices.
about-page.p2: As a student, I am constantly expanding my skills in front-end and back-end development, including technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Django, Python and more.
about-page.p3: When I'm not coding, I enjoy exploring my creative side through reading, baking, building Legos, painting, and photography. Whether it's crafting delicious treats, capturing moments with my camera, or bringing designs to life with colors or bricks, these hobbies let me relax and express myself in unique ways.
about-page.p4: Feel free to check out my work or connect with me to collaborate on exciting web development projects!

project-cards.title: Tribu
project-cards.description: Tribu is a social network allowing users to post 'echos' (posts) and 'waves' (comments) while maintaining their own personal profiles.

project-cards.title: JavaSpotify
project-cards.description: Spotify-like website that allows you to play three songs by clicking on their covers.

project-cards.title: PokemonShop
project-cards.description: Pokémon store including wishlist, shopping cart, and user profile for a personalized shopping experience.

project-cards.title: ToyTravel
project-cards.description: An interactive web page created with HTML and Bootstrap that showcases Toy Travel, a fictional travel agency for toys. Users can explore unique travel packages, destinations, and services.

project-cards.title: CheckMate
project-cards.description: Tasks app to create, organize and mark tasks as completed.

project-cards.title: MyProjects
project-cards.description: This repository features a variety of projects developed to learn, practice, and explore different technologies, showcasing my progress and versatility as a developer.

skill-cards.name: Python
skill-cards.description: I have been using it since the beginning of the web application development course. It’s essential for programming logic and backend development.

skill-cards.name: Bootstrap
skill-cards.description: We recently started using it to design web pages more quickly and efficiently.

skill-cards.name: HTML
skill-cards.description: I have been using it since the start of the course to structure and design web pages.

skill-cards.name: Django
skill-cards.description: Although I have only recently started using it, I’ve used it extensively to create dynamic web applications.

skill-cards.name: Vue
skill-cards.description: We’ve just started learning this progressive framework for building web applications.

skill-cards.name: JavaScript
skill-cards.description: It’s new to me, and I’ve used it sparingly so far, but it’s great for adding interactivity.

skill-cards.name: CSS
skill-cards.description: I have been using it since the beginning of the course to style and customize web pages.
